title: 389. Q&AF: Personal Development For Your Loved Ones, Fixing Culture In An Inherited Business & Responding To A Job Rejection
itunes:title: 389. Q&AF: Personal Development For Your Loved Ones, Fixing Culture In An Inherited Business & Responding To A Job Rejection
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to get those closest to you to commit to the process of self-improvement, the best way to fix the broken culture in a business you're soon to inherit, and the most effective way to respond to being rejected for a job position.
